ygData.subject: Re: Levels after hell levels
ygData.msgSnippet: The anecdotal evidence that this is true is overwhelming.  Deaths at 31 were overwhelming.  Everyone and I mean EVERYONE I talk to says this is true. I m
ygData.messageBody:
The anecdotal evidence that this is true is overwhelming. Deaths at 31 were
overwhelming. Everyone and I mean EVERYONE I talk to says this is true.
I'm currently 36 and fortunately have not died yet...

Slyde
----- Original Message -----
From: <kim@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, February 21, 2000 2:25 PM
Subject: [eqbards] Levels after hell levels


> From: <kim@...>
>
> It happened again, but slightly differently this time.
>
> When I was level 30, I lost about a quarter bubble per death.
> I reached 31, then died without having gained any experience.
> I lost a bit more than a half bubble into 30.
>
